meanings.definition: A type of chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed daunorubicins to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive daunorubicins as part of their cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were no match for the mighty daunorubicins!
meanings.sent4: Daunorubicins acted like brave warriors battling the cancer within the body.
meanings.sent5: The daunorubicins worked tirelessly to combat the disease, like tiny soldiers in a war.
